mapper.insert: INSERT INTO system_info( cpu_usage, swap_memory_used, swap_memory_total, memory_used, memory_total, swap_memory_usage, memory_usage, disk_used, disk_total, disk_usage, ip) VALUES ( #{cpuUsage}, #{swapMemoryUsed}, #{swapMemoryTotal}, #{memoryUsed}, #{memoryTotal}, #{swapMemoryUsage}, #{memoryUsage}, #{diskUsed}, #{diskTotal}, #{diskUsage}, #{ip})
mapper.delete: delete from system_info where ip=#{ip} and create_time < #{beforeDate}
